class.name: CrowdControlEffect
class.brief_description: Resource defining a single Crowd Control effect.
class.description: CrowdControlEffect represents an individual effect that viewers can purchase through Crowd Control. Each effect has properties like price, duration, description, and categories for organization. Effects can be instant (duration = 0) or timed (duration > 0). The resource supports quantities, parameters, and grouping for advanced functionality.

method.name: to_json
method.description: Converts the effect to a Dictionary in the format expected by Crowd Control. This is used internally by [CrowdControlGamePack] when exporting.

members.member: Categories for organizing effects in the Crowd Control menu (e.g., Player, Environment). Effects can belong to multiple categories.
Description shown to viewers before purchasing the effect. Use this to clarify what the effect does.
Duration of the effect in seconds. Set to 0 for instant effects, or 1-180 for timed effects. Streamers can override this value.
Unique identifier for the effect (e.g., "kill_player"). This is used in your game code to identify which effect was purchased.
Display name of the effect. Can be a String (e.g., "Kill Player") or a Dictionary with "public" and "sort" keys for custom sorting.
Internal groups for bulk control via effect reports (e.g., singleplayer, multiplayer). Used to enable/disable multiple effects at once.
If [code]true[/code], the effect is hidden by default in the streamer's effect list. Useful for reducing clutter with many similar effects.
Optional note displayed next to the effect name in lower contrast (e.g., Random Player). Useful for distinguishing similar effects.
Dictionary of parameter_id to [CrowdControlEffectParameter] for viewer-selectable options (e.g., color choices). Parameters don't affect price.
Cost of the effect in Crowd Control coins, where 100 coins = $1 USD. Streamers can adjust prices for their channel.
Maximum quantity viewers can purchase in a single transaction. Must be at least 1.
Minimum quantity viewers must purchase. Must be at least 1.
